site_name: Flat Basement 42 Sinclair Road London W14 0NH
description: This Council is asked for its observations on an application submitted to the London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham for: Erection of a single storey rear extension, following the removal of existing bay windows; enclosing existing gas meters in timber slat screen and erection of raised planters in the front garden; replacement of existing entrance door, canopy and a window to the side elevation at lower ground floor level; installation of new French doors with a top light, following the removal of existing single door with a top light and a window to the rear elevation at lower ground floor level; landscaping of the rear garden to include alterations to the garden floor level and repositioning of external steps.
